TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but your friend was crushed by a giant boulder while driving home to play with you.

I wish for a wild emu.

[]

Edited August 2, 2019 by CvVtjRtb

I wish for help

*snip*

which is then corrupted by being corrupted, which is corrucpted by being uncorrupt,

I wish for help

granted, but they help you kill yourself.

I wish for chunky puffs

Granted. They are chunky puffs of whats left of your torso after the chunky puff material preperation process.

I wish that scout face meme thing was even more popular.

Granted, it becomes so popular that everyone has plastic surgery to look like the scout and nobody is recognizable.

I wish for cake

Granted, but it may or may not be a lie.

I wish that the pie was a lie.

Granted, but the fact that it was granted; was in fact a lie

I wish for wishes that can wish so they they can wish for wishes that wish that they could wish (umad kerbals?)

Granted, but the definition of what was previously called wish is now moved over to the word wieesh.

I wieesh for a kerbal rocket in real life.

Granted, but it malfunctions in some horribly epic fashion (am I the only one who this happens to?)

I wish for a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.

Granted, but it is served on moldy bread..

I wish for a 1955 Corvette...

Granted, but Jeb is your driver!

I wish i could fly higher than jebs SRB (attached to pslytely psycho's 1955 Covette)

Granted, but you go so far up, you get stuck in orbit forever.

I wish for something to wish for.

Granted. You wish for the earth, and is squashes you.

I wish to be banned

Granted, but the ban is a lie.

I wish to be good at KSP.

Granted, you are now good at Kerpal Spooce Prowgraem, a cheap knock-off copy of KSP.

I wish that I was a Em El Ghee Prow at KSP.

Granted, but the power destroys yer computer

I wish I was riding an SRB with infinite fuel.

Granted, but it causes a paradox in the universe that tears apart the fabric of space.

I wish for money

Granted, but all of it is attached to a dye pack bomb that cant be defused.

I wish for a garden gnome that controls space and time.

Granted, but every time the gnome uses his powers, someone you love gets torn apart by the changing physics of space and time.

I wish for....intergalactic travel in KSP, complete with real time travel times. (no time warps allowed)

Granted, but this takes up all of KSP's development time that would have gone to other features, causing everyone to ragequit KSP.

I wish for a house made out of lego.

Granted, but the floor is too, and socks and shoes don't exist.

I wish I was as famous as Scott Manley

Granted, but Scott Manley gets jealous of your prowess, and then hires an assassin to kill you.

I wish for the 3 Eds to be real.

Granted, you now have 3 clones of Ed.

I wish for a moon hotel.

Granted. It collapses due to not being pressurised

I wish Take on Mars worked for me
